about_the_game:
"

Dragons NPC Dice Pack Volume 1

Unleash the might of dragons in your tabletop adventures with the **Dragons NPC Dice Pack Volume 1**. This digital dice pack is dedicated to the legendary chromatic and metallic dragons, offering a majestic and powerful addition to your game. These dice are perfect for NPC dragons when they roll for attack rolls, saving throws, skill checks, and other non-damage rolls, as well as all of your dragon-inspired characters. Automatically linked to specific dragon types, they can also be used for any other dragons you encounter. Dice Included:
  • Wyrmscale Red
  • Wyrmscale Blue
  • Wyrmscale Green
  • Wyrmscale Black
  • Wyrmscale White
  • Wyrmscale Gold
  • Wyrmscale Silver
  • Wyrmscale Bronze
  • Wyrmscale Copper
  • Wyrmscale Brass
  • Wyrmscale Red Fx
  • Wyrmscale Blue Fx
  • Wyrmscale Green Fx
  • Wyrmscale Black Fx
  • Wyrmscale White Fx
  • Wyrmscale Gold Fx
  • Wyrmscale Silver Fx
  • Wyrmscale Bronze Fx
  • Wyrmscale Copper Fx
  • Wyrmscale Brass Fx
Each dice set captures the essence and grandeur of its corresponding dragon type, bringing a visually captivating and thematic element to your game. Elevate your dragon encounters and make every roll a legendary moment with the Dragons NPC Dice Pack Volume 1."
